experience.title: Microsoft Intern Engage 2022
experience.description: - Developed a restaurant and customer management browser-based application using facial recognition technology.- Here we integrated restaurant cameras with the web app to face recognize customers so that they can have a personalized experience right from check-ins, orders, and check-outs to making things easier for restaurants to manage as well.- Deployed the live-streaming server for WebRTC (Aiortc) and token management server for Django using Heroku.- Serialized the data and implemented REST API methods to get, and post the data.- Followed agile(scrum) methodology while developing the application.
experience.description_html: - Developed a restaurant and customer management browser-based application using facial recognition technology.- Here we integrated restaurant cameras with the web app to face recognize customers so that they can have a personalized experience right from check-ins, orders, and check-outs to making things easier for restaurants to manage as well.- Deployed the live-streaming server for WebRTC (Aiortc) and token management server for Django using Heroku.- Serialized the data and implemented REST API methods to get, and post the data.- Followed agile(scrum) methodology while developing the application.
